document_data.name: Khynree
document_data.mainbody: '''Khynree''' ({{Pronounce|KEN|ree|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Foreign Affairs|23}}}}) was a [[wizard]] that lived in the town of [[Ayakar]] in [[Turmish]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was known for his skill with. ''[[teleport]]ation'' magic and would charge passengers for translocational voyages across [[Faer√ªn]].{{Cite adventurers league/Foreign Affairs|5}}
document_data.Personality: He was never one to forget nor forgive a debt, and made practicing of charging three times his normal fee for anyone previously unable to pay.{{Cite adventurers league/Foreign Affairs|36}}
document_data.Activities:
Khynree would charge somewhere in the neighborhood of 1,000 [[gp]] for his services.{{Cite adventurers league/Foreign Affairs|21}} and the underwater [[storm giant]] fortress of [[Maelstrom]] in the [[Trackless Sea]],{{Cite adventurers league/Foreign Affairs|4}} 

Kynree's abilities were not limited to the [[Prime Material plane]]. By means of ''[[plane shift|certain spells]]'' he could also transport clientele to other [[planes of existence]], including the eternal battlefield of [[Avernus]] in the [[Nine Hells]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Harrowing of Hell|5}}
document_data.Relationships:
Due to some unfortunate circumstances, Khynree came to work for the [[Zulkir]] of [[Enchantment]] [[Dar'lon Ma]]. At some point prior he had indebted himself to the [[Red Wizards]] of [[Thay]].

He was also a known associate of [[Zehira Deryan]].
document_data.History: Some time during or after the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Khynree transported a band of [[adventurer]]s down to the Nine Hells, as they quested for the soul of the [[undead]] Storm King [[Hekaton]].
